title: Learning Style-Based Technology Application Course for Physics Module Design at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics concepts and high school-level mathematics proficiency
context.additional_context: Real-time video lectures conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Learning effectiveness is monitored through formative assessments.

learning_goals: A physics module can be designed by applying the 5-stage Isman instructional design model (analysis, design, development, implementation, evaluation)
Optimized technical tools can be selected for learner types (visual/verbal, active/reflective) using the Felder-Silverman learning style model
Propose at least three effective physics content delivery strategies in constrained technological environments (smartphone-based)

resources: Online Quiz System with Real-Time Feedback
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
